about.title: About IceAlan
about.content:
IceAlan High School was founded on the principles of academic rigor and character development. Our campus, located in the heart of the city, provides a sanctuary for learning and growth.

We believe in fostering a community where every student is valued and challenged to reach their full potential. From our state-of-the-art science labs to our historic arts theater, every corner of IceAlan is designed to inspire.

admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.content:
We welcome applications from students who demonstrate intellectual curiosity and a commitment to their community. Our admissions process is holistic, looking beyond just grades to the character and potential of each applicant.

Key Dates:
- Application Deadline: January 15th
- Entrance Exams: February 2nd
- Interview Period: February 15th - 28th

academics.title: Academic Excellence
academics.content:
Our curriculum is designed to challenge students and prepare them for top-tier universities worldwide. We offer a broad range of GCSE and A-Level subjects, taught by experts in their fields.

Departments include Sciences, Mathematics, Humanities, Languages, and the Arts. We also offer extended project qualifications and research opportunities.

student-life.title: Student Life
student-life.content:
Life at IceAlan extends far beyond the classroom. With over 50 clubs and societies, competitive sports teams, and a thriving arts scene, there is something for everyone.

Our House system promotes camaraderie and friendly competition, ensuring every student feels a sense of belonging from day one.

support.title: Support IceAlan
support.content:
The IceAlan Annual Fund supports scholarships, facility upgrades, and faculty development. Your generosity ensures that we can continue to offer a world-class education to deserving students regardless of their financial background.

Ways to Give:
- One-time Donation
- Monthly Giving
- Legacy Pledges

news.title: News & Events
news.content: Stay up to date with the latest happenings at IceAlan High School. From academic achievements to alumni success stories, discover what makes our community unique.

footer.aboutText: IceAlan High School has been providing a distinctive, innovative preparatory education for young leaders since 1895. Located in the heart of London.
